message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $18,000. It's a great deal, and I know you'll find it very valuable. Let me know what you think.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I understand the value of your product, but I am only able to pay up to $15,000 for it. I hope this revised offer is acceptable.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I'm not able to go down to $15,000 right now. I'm willing to come down to $16,500. That's still a fair price considering the value of the product. What do you think?
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to counter with an offer of $15,000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price given its value to me.
